verses.name: Lamentations 4:10
verses.text: The hands of the pitiful women have sodden their own children: they were their meat in the destruction of the daughter of my people.

verses.name: Lamentations 4:11
verses.text: The Lord hath accomplished his fury; he hath poured out his fierce anger, and hath kindled a fire in Zion, and it hath devoured the foundations thereof.

verses.name: Lamentations 4:12
verses.text: The kings of the earth, and all the inhabitants of the world, would not have believed that the adversary and the enemy should have entered into the gates of Jerusalem.
